response.original_title: Das Boot - The Original Uncut Version
response.overview: Widely imitated yet never equaled, claustrophobic thriller DAS BOOT resurfaces and the definitive original uncut version! At the height of World War 2, a young submarine crew heads out to sea on a top secret mission that all but ensures most will never make it home alive. Ordered to patrol the Atlantic and destroy an allied Armada bringing supplies to Britain, these raw recruits must band together, bracing themselves against a depth charge assault from an unseen enemy dash can the captain and his crew summon the strength to escape their watery grave.
response.title: Das Boot - The Original Uncut Version
